settings.heading: Raleigh Easter Meal Kits
settings.text:
Easter is for enjoying loved ones. But with hams to glaze and green beans to string, hosts barely have enough time to sit down at the dinner table. Fortunately, there’s a better solution.

With Table & Twine’s Easter meal kits in Raleigh, you can pull off a delicious spread in no time. Each kit comes with pre-measured and pre-prepared ingredients, meaning you won’t need to spend hours mincing veggies and muddling herbs. Instead, you can just heat, serve, and relax.

settings.heading: How Our Easter Meal Kits Work
settings.text:
This Easter, impress friends and family by preparing a restaurant-quality feast in your very own kitchen. Since our chefs handle the more technical aspects of cooking, from julienning to sous-viding, you’ll just need to know the fundamentals to pull off an elegant Easter meal.

Even better, our carefully curated menus appeal to all guests – from picky kids to sophisticated adults. This spring, expect [description here].

settings.title: Less Stress, More Convenience
settings.text: As a host, it can be hard to enjoy your own party. But when you choose Easter at-home catering in Raleigh, you’ll never miss the egg hunt. Since our talented chefs prepare 90% of your meal, you won’t need to waste hours planning, shopping, and chopping. Plus, after your guests bid farewell, you won’t have a big mess to clean up.

settings.title: Delicious, Family-Friendly Recipes
settings.text: We’ll whip up a restaurant-quality meal that is sure to please adults and children alike. These dishes take inspiration from classic, southern flavors and incorporate fresh, seasonal produce and sustainably-sourced proteins. Even better, our Executive Pastry Chef thoughtfully develops fun and exciting desserts each Easter.

settings.title: A Lasting Impression
settings.text: As catering professionals, we know no shindig is complete without good food. That’s why we have developed an Easter meal package that features all the fixings needed for a memorable family gathering. From savory sides to incredible entrées, we’ll provide you with recipes that make an impression.

settings.heading: Why Choose an Easter Meal Kit?
settings.text: Maybe you love to whip up lavish, home-cooked dinners. Or, maybe you prefer to microwave your meals. No matter your skill level, Table & Twine will help you put together a delicious family-style brunch or dinner. We work hard to make sure you enjoy the benefits of at-home Easter catering in Raleigh, including:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my Easter meal kit?
settings.text: You’ll just need one to two hours to prepare your Easter meal. Afterward, you can sit down at the dinner table and enjoy your friends and family.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Easter meal kit?
settings.text: To ensure that you receive your meal kit on time, please order your Easter meal by [insert date].

settings.title: Can I customize my Easter meal kit?
settings.text: Our Easter meal kits cannot be customized. At Table & Twine, our chefs thoughtfully develop holiday meals with something for everyone.
